location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Letter from William T Salmon, Commander of the British Ship [ Forth], at Muscat'

mods.abstract: Letter from William T Salmon, Commander of the British Ship [ Forth], at Muscat, reporting on the circumstances of the death of Rev Thomas Brockman.In enclosure:Copy of letter sent to the British Agent at Muscat on 24 May 1846 by Brockman, requesting for the Agent's advice regarding his visit to Muscat;Letter sent on 26 July 1846 by Brockman, requesting for medicine;Lists of effects of Brockman.
